resources.string: PayPal Business: send invoices
Manage sales, invoices and money
PayPal Business makes it easier to manage your activity, check your balance, send invoices, view customer information and analyse sales trends. Any time. Anywhere.
Stay on top of your PayPal Business account while on the go.
For businesses on the go. Send invoices, track sales and manage your money with the PayPal Business app.
Manage your Working Capital cash advance
o Access your customer information quickly and easily
Make, send and manage invoices quickly from the PayPal Business app. PayPal\'s invoice creation tool also makes it easier to send payment reminders to customers directly from your mobile device.
See your daily sales and view your business\' monthly, quarterly and yearly sales at a glance.
WITHDRAW MONEY
Move money to your linked merchant bank account, issue refunds and send money in just a few steps. Save time by skipping the queues at the bank with this mobile money-management app.
MAKE REPAYMENTS TOWARDS YOUR WORKING CAPITAL CASH ADVANCE
Have a PayPal Working Capital cash advance\? Now you can make repayments and track your repayment progress from the PayPal Business app.
View customer transaction history and contact information, and get in touch with your customers directly from your mobile device. It\'s also easier to import your contacts.
The PayPal Business app offers your small business a quick and simple way to make and send invoices, get paid and manage your money right from your mobile device.
Need to accept credit and debit cards on a mobile device\? Try the PayPal Here mobile app.
send money, get paid, payment, bank, transfer, sales, insights, customer, invoice maker, invoice, free, pay
Thank you for using PayPal Business. We\'ve fixed bugs and crashes to help make your experience better every day.
Managing your businesses will be easier now as we\'ve fixed bugs and crashes with this update. We hope you enjoy the app.
With every update we try to improve your experience and make your business management and invoice creation easier and faster. Thank you for using PayPal Business.
In this update you\'ll find improvements and fixes to help make it easier for you to manage your business and PayPal account. Enjoy the PayPal Business app.
In this release, we\'ve fixed bugs and error messages to help improve your experience when sending an invoice. Thank you for using PayPal Business.
